description:
Located in the ever-popular estate of Mossfiel this home will sure impress the moment you walk through the doors. Perfectly located close to Hoppers Crossing station, and walking distance to Hoppers Crossing Secondary College, Hogans Corner Shopping Centre, Pacific Werribee and public transport.
This East facing family friendly home is the perfect opportunity to enter the market with three Bedroom plus study, brick veneer home which presents endless options for all.
Comprises of three bedrooms with the main bedroom having a walk-in robe and an ensuite and the other two bedrooms having built in robes. Also a centrally located bathroom with separate bath to take care of all the needs of a modern growing family. Remaining 2 bedrooms have Built in Robes.

With the spacious open plan kitchen not only having a great flow through to the backyard but has also stainless-steel appliances, 5 burner gas cook top and ample storage. The Separate lounge area with Study Nook creates the ideal working space from the comfort of your home.

Other features include:
Big backyard with extension possibilities (STCA).
Split system cooling
2 x garden sheds.
With good size front and rear yard & no body corporate fees on it, it is the perfect property to buy for an investor, first home buyer, or someone looking to downsize.
With this location you don't have to go through the hassle of finding a parking spot, you can just walk to everywhere.

You won't find better value than this. So don't miss your chance to make this fantastic home or savvy investment yours call Jerry Jacob on 0404 727 772 or Pratik Shah on 0430 437 402 for further details!

Please refer to the Statement of Information for Indicative selling price range.
Photo ID is a must on inspection.

DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent. Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
